title: Getting to Know Each Other
introduction: This lesson delves into a dialogue between two individuals who are getting to know each other, covering topics such as hobbies, work, and personal interests.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.translation: So, what do you do for work?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Soy diseñador gráfico. He trabajado en publicidad durante los últimos cinco años.
story.translation: I'm a graphic designer. I've been working in advertising for the last five years.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Eso suena interesante. ¿Qué te llevó a esa carrera?
story.translation: That sounds interesting. What led you to that career?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Siempre he sido creativo y me encanta el arte. El diseño gráfico fue una manera de combinar ambos.
story.translation: I've always been creative and I love art. Graphic design was a way to combine both.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Increíble. ¿Y qué haces en tu tiempo libre?
story.translation: Incredible. And what do you do in your free time?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Me gusta mucho la música y tocar la guitarra. También disfruto del senderismo.
story.translation: I really like music and playing the guitar. I also enjoy hiking.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Parece que tenemos intereses similares. También disfruto de la música y el aire libre.
story.translation: It seems we have similar interests. I also enjoy music and the outdoors.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Eso es genial. Deberíamos planear una salida algún día.
story.translation: That's great. We should plan an outing one day.
